overview:
Kyusik Chung likes non-fiction books that investigate the economics behind how our world works and books about crazy mountaineering adventures. He’s not a big fan of “pseudo-science” books or most of the recent hyper-popular novels. He looks forward to his daily commute, when he gets most of his reading done.

Prior to founding Discovereads, Kyusik was a Product Manager at Zillow.com where he helped create the “Zestimate” valuation engine that predicts over 45 million individual home prices every day. Prior to Zillow, Kyusik was a Lead Program Manager at Expedia.
